sentences.en: " I actually transmitted and received intelligible signals. " he said.
sentences.cn: 他说: “ 我真的发送并收到了有意义的信号. ”

sentences.en: An intelligible gleam of assent twinkled in his eye.
sentences.cn: 一种会意的赞同的光彩闪现在他的眼睛里.

sentences.en: Do not coin terms that are intelligible to nobody.
sentences.cn: 不要生造谁也不懂的词语.

sentences.en: Her mother would talk of her viwes in the same intelligible tone.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲偏偏要大声发表高见.

sentences.en: His interpretation is coherent and intelligible.
His lecture was readily intelligible to all the students.
sentences.cn: 他的讲课学生们都能轻松地听懂。
他的回复几乎让人听不懂。

sentences.en: Legends should be intelligible without reference to the text.
sentences.cn: 传奇应当不用参考文字就能理解.

sentences.en: The deep guttural sounds of the speaker were scarcely intelligible to the newly - waked, bewildered listener.
sentences.cn: 说话人的深重的喉音, 使这个刚醒而还莫名其妙的人几乎难以听得清楚.

sentences.en: The language of Darwin was intelligible to experts and non-experts alike.
sentences.cn: 达尔文的语言无论对专家还是非专业人士而言都明白易懂。

sentences.en: This piece of writing is too confused to be intelligible.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章写得太乱,不知所云.

sentences.en: This report will be intelligible only to an expert in computer.
sentences.cn: 这份报告恐怕只有电脑专家能看懂.

sentences.en: This report would be intelligible only to an expert in computing.
sentences.cn: 只有计算机运算专家才能看懂这份报告.

sentences.en: Those were his only intelligible words.
sentences.cn: 这些是他说的仅仅能听得懂的话.

sentences.en: Thus , they argue: "'Unintelligibility'resulting from faithfulness is worse than faithlessness that makes translation'intelligible '. "
sentences.cn: 故此主张 “ 与其忠实而使人看不懂,毋宁不很忠实而看得懂. ”

words.tran_cn: 智能的；聪明的；理解力强的
智力，理解力；知识分子；思维逻辑领悟力；智力高的人
知识分子；凭理智做事者
智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力
可理解的；明了的；仅能用智力了解的

trans.tran_cn: 可理解的，明白易懂的，清楚的
trans.tran_en: if speech, writing, or an idea is intelligible, it can be easily understood
